title: Print all subsequences of a string
problem:
Given a string, we have to find out all its subsequences of it. A String is a subsequence of a given String, that is generated by deleting some character of a given string without changing its order.

 

Examples:

Input : abc
Output : a, b, c, ab, bc, ac, abc

 

Your Task:  
You don't need to read input or print anything. Your task is to complete the function subsequences() which takes the string str as input and returns a list of all possible subsequences of the string.

 

Expected Time Complexity: O(2^N), where N is the length of the input string.
Expected Auxiliary Space: O(2^N), where N is the length of the input string.
